name: infinite duel (NathBo)
description:
Choose your favorite adventurer between Yugo, Leito, Yuki and Ragnir and battle dangerous waves of ennemies or fight your best friends in epic and frenzied confrontations

Controls :

(note : there is an ingame tutorial that explains everything)

For Player 1 : arrow keys to move, I to shoot, O to use your specials

For Player 2 : WASD keys to move, 1 to shoot, 2 to use your specials

P to pause the game
